tooltips.category: A bucket you assign expenses to—e.g. Food, Rent, Transportation. This helps you organize and track spending patterns.
tooltips.budget: The maximum amount you plan to spend in a category during a specific period. Set budgets to control your expenses.
tooltips.recurring: Mark this expense to repeat automatically on the schedule you set—weekly, monthly, or yearly.
tooltips.wallet: Your current available balance across all connected accounts and cards.
tooltips.savings_goal: A target amount you want to save for something specific, like a vacation or emergency fund.
tooltips.spending_alert: Get notified when you're approaching or exceeding your budget limits for any category.
tooltips.insights: AI-powered analysis of your spending patterns and personalized recommendations to improve your finances.
tooltips.analytics: Visual reports and charts showing your spending trends, budget performance, and financial progress over time.
tooltips.receipt_scan: Use your camera to automatically capture expense details from receipts—no manual entry needed!
tooltips.export: Download your financial data as CSV or Excel files for external analysis or record keeping.

faqs.question: What is a Category?
faqs.answer: A category is a way to organize your expenses into groups like Food, Rent, Transportation, Entertainment, etc. This helps you understand where your money goes and makes budgeting easier.

faqs.question: How do I add my first expense?
faqs.answer: Go to the Budget tab, tap the '+' button, then either manually enter your expense details or use the camera to scan a receipt. The app will automatically extract the amount and details.

faqs.question: How do I set a budget?
faqs.answer: Go to Budget → Manage Budgets, tap 'Add Budget', choose a category, set your monthly limit, and save. You'll get alerts when you're approaching the limit.

faqs.question: Can I set different budgets for different months?
faqs.answer: Yes! You can create custom budgets for specific months or use budget templates for recurring monthly budgets. Go to Budget settings to manage both options.

faqs.question: What happens when I exceed my budget?
faqs.answer: You'll receive a notification alerting you that you've exceeded your budget. The app will show the overage amount and suggest ways to get back on track.

faqs.question: How does receipt scanning work?
faqs.answer: Tap the camera icon when adding an expense, point your camera at the receipt, and tap to capture. Our AI will extract the merchant name, amount, date, and suggest a category automatically.

faqs.question: Can I edit expenses after adding them?
faqs.answer: Yes! Tap on any expense in your list to edit the amount, category, date, or notes. Changes are saved automatically.

faqs.question: How do recurring expenses work?
faqs.answer: When adding an expense, toggle 'Recurring' and set the frequency (weekly, monthly, yearly). The app will automatically add this expense on the schedule you set.

faqs.question: How do I set a savings goal?
faqs.answer: Go to Dashboard → Add Goal, enter your goal name, target amount, and deadline. Track your progress and get motivated with visual progress indicators.

faqs.question: Can I have multiple savings goals?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Create separate goals for vacation, emergency fund, new car, etc. Each goal tracks independently and shows individual progress.

faqs.question: How do spending alerts work?
faqs.answer: Set spending alerts to get notified at 50%, 80%, or 100% of your budget. Go to Dashboard → Add Alert to customize notifications for each category.

faqs.question: Can I turn off notifications?
faqs.answer: Yes! Go to Profile → Notification Settings to customize which alerts you receive and how often. You can disable specific types or all notifications.

faqs.question: What are AI Insights?
faqs.answer: AI Insights analyze your spending patterns and provide personalized recommendations, like suggesting budget adjustments or highlighting unusual spending trends.

faqs.question: How often are insights updated?
faqs.answer: Insights refresh daily and after significant spending activity. The more you use the app, the more accurate and personalized your insights become.

faqs.question: Is my financial data secure?
faqs.answer: Yes! All data is encrypted and stored securely with Firebase. We never share your personal financial information with third parties.

faqs.question: Can I export my data?
faqs.answer: Yes! Go to Profile → Data Export to download your expenses, budgets, and goals as CSV or Excel files for your records or external analysis.

faqs.question: The app is running slowly. What should I do?
faqs.answer: Try closing and reopening the app, or restart your device. If problems persist, go to Profile → Report Issue to contact support.

faqs.question: Receipt scanning isn't working properly.
faqs.answer: Ensure good lighting and hold the camera steady. Clean receipts work best. If issues persist, you can always enter expenses manually and contact support.
